description: Styling for the theme management and layout of the Tic Tac Toe web application. Includes variables for light and dark themes, styles for various application components, and responsive design considerations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling that sets the text alignment, background color, and transitions.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header of the application, including layout and color transitions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, with hover transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning, background color, and hover/active effects.

methods.name: App-logo
methods.description: Styling for the application logo, including dimensions and animation effects.
